short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight, focus, select, and scroll through HTML elements by CSS selector

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search HTML elements by CSS Selectors. Simple tag selectors like h1, div, input can be used, or more complex selectors like a.icon[href*="doc"]

Has shortcut keys for open and close search, next, previous, first, last match, and focus, select, and click match.

The outline of matches can be customized. All matches can also be displayed in the developer console.
